article_title: Estate Planners Turn Focus to Income Tax
article_text:
New tax rules for 2013 are turning estate planning on its head. Instead of an emphasis on avoiding the estate tax, many plans now focus on trimming income taxes.

Top income-tax rates have risen to more than 43% for some people, while the federal estate tax affects fewer people because of a $5.25 million individual exemption for estates, up from...
